targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" WHERE ("value"::field < $peakPowerLimit) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") * (-1) FROM "homePower" WHERE ("value"::field < $peakPowerLimit) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") * (-1) FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND "loadpoint"::tag !~ $loadpointBlacklist GROUP BY time(1m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')

model.description:
Grün: Prioritisierunggrenze für Autoladung

Rot: Tiefentladegrenze des Hausspeichers

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter and value <= 100 GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "vehicleSoc" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("vehicle"::tag <> '')  GROUP BY time(5m), "vehicle"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')

model.title: Batterien

targets.query: SELECT last("value") * 100 FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0) tz('$timezone')

model.description: Autarkie muss durch die Summe der Haus Energie und die Summe der einzelnen Loadpoints geteilt werden.

targets.query: SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < $peakPowerLimit  GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < $peakPowerLimit  GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none) tz('$timezone')

SELECT SUM("integral") FROM
(
  SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')
) GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')

model.title: Kennzahlen

targets.query: SELECT integral("subquery") /3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')

SELECT SUM("integral") FROM
(
  SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')
) GROUP BY time(15m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < $peakPowerLimit  GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < $peakPowerLimit  GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") /3600000 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter  and value < $peakPowerLimit GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") /-3600000 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter and value < $peakPowerLimit GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value")  / -3600000 FROM "chargePower" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag <> '') AND $timeFilter  AND "vehicle"::tag !~ $vehicleBlacklist GROUP BY time(1d), "vehicle"::tag fill(0) tz('$timezone')

SELECT "guest_energy" FROM (SELECT integral("value") / -3600000 AS "guest_energy"  FROM "chargePower" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag = '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('$timezone')) WHERE "guest_energy" <= -0.1
SELECT last("value") FROM "chargePower"
SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" WHERE ("value"::field < $peakPowerLimit) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") * (-1) FROM "homePower" WHERE ("value"::field < $peakPowerLimit) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") *(-1) FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") * (-1) FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND "loadpoint"::tag !~ $loadpointBlacklist GROUP BY time(1m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value")  / 1000 FROM "autogen"."pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value")  / 1000 FROM "autogen"."gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT "value" *(-1)/1000 FROM "autogen"."homePower" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT "value"  / 1000 FROM "autogen"."batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") *(-1)/1000 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND "loadpoint"::tag !~ $loadpointBlacklist GROUP BY time($__interval), "loadpoint"::tag fill(null)

list.description: Zeitzone: TZ Identifier wie hier gelistet: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List
list.label: Zeitzone
list.name: timezone

list.description: Grenze der maximalen Leistung in W, über diese hinaus Leistungswerte als Ausreißer ignoriert werden.
list.label: Filter für maximale Leistung / W
list.name: peakPowerLimit

list.description: URL unter der EVCC geöffnet wird.
list.label: EVCC URL
list.name: evccUrl

list.description: Name des Wechselrichterportals für den Link auf das Portal.
list.label: Name, Wechselrichterportal
list.name: inverterPortalTitle

list.description: URL unter der das Wechselrichterportal geöffnet wird.
list.label: URL, Wechselrichterportal
list.name: inverterPortalUrl

list.description:
Liste der Loadpoints, die NICHT angezeigt werden sollen. Der Ausdruck ist eine reguläre Expression, die mit / anfangen und mit / enden muss. Sie darf nicht leer sein, wenn also nichts gefiltert werden sollte, muss hier eine reguläre Expression stehen, die keinen der Einträge matched.

Beispiele:
Keine Einträge: /^none$/
Filtere 'Garage' aus: /^Garage$/
Filtere 'Garage' und 'Stellplatz' aus: /^Garage$|^Stellplatz$/
Filtere alles, das mit 'foo' beginnt aus: /^foo.*$/
list.label: Blacklist für Loadpoints
list.name: loadpointBlacklist

list.description:
Liste der Fahrzeuge, die NICHT angezeigt werden sollen. Der Ausdruck ist eine reguläre Expression, die mit / anfangen und mit / enden muss. Sie darf nicht leer sein, wenn also nichts gefiltert werden sollte, muss hier eine reguläre Expression stehen, die keinen der Einträge matched.

Beispiele:
Keine Einträge: /^none$/
Filtere 'Garage' aus: /^Garage$/
Filtere 'Garage' und 'Stellplatz' aus: /^Garage$|^Stellplatz$/
Filtere Fahrzeuge mit (offline) am Ende aus: /^.*\(offline\)$/
list.label: Blacklist für Fahrzeuge
list.name: vehicleBlacklist
